sentences.text: Not only did she pass the exam, but she also topped the class.
sentences.correct_text: Not only did she pass the exam, but she also topped the class.
sentences.explanation: This sentence is correct - no error

sentences.text: Were it not for his timely intervention, the project would fail.
sentences.correct_text: Were it not for his timely intervention, the project would have failed.
sentences.explanation: Third conditional requires 'would have + past participle'
sentences.explanation_uz: Uchinchi shartli gap 'would have + past participle' talab qiladi

sentences.text: It is imperative that the committee meets immediately.
sentences.correct_text: It is imperative that the committee meet immediately.

sentences.text: Rarely one encounters such a profound philosophical discourse.
sentences.correct_text: Rarely does one encounter such a profound philosophical discourse.

sentences.text: The hypothesis, albeit controversial, has significant implications.
sentences.correct_text: The hypothesis, albeit controversial, has significant implications.
sentences.explanation: This sentence is correct - 'albeit' is properly used

sentences.text: On no account guests should be admitted without proper identification.
sentences.correct_text: On no account should guests be admitted without proper identification.
sentences.explanation_uz: 'On no account' dan keyin inversiya kerak

sentences.text: It was suggested that he resigns from his position.
sentences.correct_text: It was suggested that he resign from his position.

sentences.text: At no time I was aware of the fraudulent activity.
sentences.correct_text: At no time was I aware of the fraudulent activity.
sentences.explanation_uz: 'At no time' dan keyin inversiya kerak

sentences.text: Notwithstanding of the challenges, the team persevered.
sentences.correct_text: Notwithstanding the challenges, the team persevered.

sentences.text: Such was the complexity of the problem that few could comprehend it.
sentences.correct_text: Such was the complexity of the problem that few could comprehend it.

sentences.text: Under no circumstances the documents should be disclosed.
sentences.correct_text: Under no circumstances should the documents be disclosed.
sentences.explanation_uz: 'Under no circumstances' dan keyin inversiya kerak

sentences.text: It is vital that every precaution is taken.
sentences.correct_text: It is vital that every precaution be taken.

sentences.text: In no way this policy should be interpreted as discriminatory.
sentences.correct_text: In no way should this policy be interpreted as discriminatory.
sentences.explanation_uz: 'In no way' dan keyin inversiya kerak

sentences.text: It is essential that each participant signs the consent form.
sentences.correct_text: It is essential that each participant sign the consent form.

sentences.text: Only by rigorous analysis we can arrive at accurate conclusions.
sentences.correct_text: Only by rigorous analysis can we arrive at accurate conclusions.

sentences.text: Nowhere else you will find such pristine natural beauty.
sentences.correct_text: Nowhere else will you find such pristine natural beauty.

sentences.text: It is requested that the report is submitted by Friday.
sentences.correct_text: It is requested that the report be submitted by Friday.

sentences.text: So intricate was the puzzle that experts couldn't solve it.
sentences.correct_text: So intricate was the puzzle that experts couldn't solve it.

sentences.text: Not since the Renaissance has there been such a flourishing of the arts.
sentences.correct_text: Not since the Renaissance has there been such a flourishing of the arts.

sentences.text: The committee recommended that she is promoted.
sentences.correct_text: The committee recommended that she be promoted.
